name: Gridspech
description:
A puzzle game about grids and symbols.

This isn't the best comparison, but... think Picross meets The Witness.

GAME IS IN EARLY STAGES! Consider it a proof of concept. Definitely playable, but not a lot of content right now. I hope to make a lot more puzzles!

Rules

Click a tile to toggle it, press Space to validate the grid. The rest is brainstorming and deduction!

Start with the tutorial puzzles ("A" puzzles). After that, there's no mandatory puzzle order.

Credits

Sound assets from Kenney assets and Tonedock.
